channel.title: Peer to peer databases
channel.description:
This thread is about aggregation of existing decentralized database systems that we could use in MESG or at least that are good to know :)
Feel free to add the one you know.

item.title: Peer to peer databases
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
Just discovered today https://github.com/orbitdb/orbit-db that is based on IPFS and using IPFS pubsub system.

Also BigchainDB that is apparently using mongodb replication based on Tendermint consensus.

Read full topic
